attributes.action: Cap the tax on fuel at times when Oil prices increase
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stopping tax on fuel altogether simply will not happen.
However, at times when oil prices increase for whatever reason, diesel and petrol taxes should be capped thus the increased cost of motoring shared by the public and the government, rather than the public getting screwed into the ground and the government profiting from it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
